mapper.select: SELECT CLUB_NUM, CLUB_STOREDPHOTO, CLUB_NAME, CLUB_PRESIDENT, CLUB_LOCATION, CLUB_LEVEL, CLUB_MEMBERCOUNT FROM CLUB WHERE STATUS = '승인' ORDER BY CLUB_NUM DESC

SELECT CLUB_NUM, CLUB_STOREDPHOTO, CLUB_NAME, CLUB_PRESIDENT, CLUB_LOCATION, CLUB_LEVEL, CLUB_MEMBERCOUNT FROM ( SELECT CEIL(rownum / #{searchDto.limit}) page, CLUB_NUM, CLUB_STOREDPHOTO, CLUB_NAME, CLUB_PRESIDENT, CLUB_LOCATION, CLUB_LEVEL, CLUB_MEMBERCOUNT FROM ( SELECT CLUB_NUM, CLUB_STOREDPHOTO, CLUB_NAME, CLUB_PRESIDENT, CLUB_LOCATION, CLUB_LEVEL, CLUB_MEMBERCOUNT FROM CLUB WHERE STATUS = '승인'
AND CLUB_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchDto.searchValue} || '%'
AND CLUB_PRESIDENT LIKE '%' || #{searchDto.searchValue} || '%'
AND CLUB_LOCATION LIKE '%' || #{searchDto.searchValue} || '%'
AND CLUB_LEVEL = #{searchDto.searchValue}
AND (CLUB_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchDto.searchValue} || '%' OR CLUB_PRESIDENT LIKE '%' || #{searchDto.searchValue} || '%' OR CLUB_LOCATION LIKE '%' || #{searchDto.searchValue} || '%' OR CLUB_LEVEL = #{searchDto.searchValue})
ORDER BY CLUB_NUM DESC ) ) WHERE page = #{searchDto.page}

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CLUB (CLUB_NUM, CLUB_NAME, CLUB_PRESIDENT, CLUB_INFO, CLUB_LEVEL, CLUB_LOCATION, CLUB_PHONE, CLUB_PHOTO, CLUB_STOREDPHOTO) VALUES (CLUB_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{clubName}, #{clubPresident}, #{clubInfo}, #{clubLevel}, #{clubLocation}, #{clubPhone}, #{clubPhoto}, #{clubStoredPhoto})
mapper.select: SELECT CLUB_NUM, CLUB_STOREDPHOTO, CLUB_NAME, CLUB_PRESIDENT, TO_CHAR(CLUB_REGDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') CLUB_REGDATE, CLUB_MEMBERCOUNT, CLUB_LEVEL, CLUB_LOCATION, CLUB_INFO FROM CLUB WHERE CLUB_NUM = #{clubNum} AND STATUS = '승인'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CLUBJOINLIST (JOIN_NUM, CLUB_NUM, MEMBER_NUM, JOIN_MEMBERPHOTO, JOIN_MEMBERNAME, JOIN_MEMBERPHONE, JOIN_MEMBEREMAIL, JOIN_MEMBERLEVEL, JOIN_MEMBERINFO, JOIN_DATE, JOIN_STATUS) VALUES (JOIN_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{clubNum}, #{memberNum}, #{joinMemberPhoto}, #{joinMemberName}, #{joinMemberPhone}, #{joinMemberEmail}, #{joinMemberLevel}, #{joinMemberInfo}, SYSDATE, '대기')
mapper.select: SELECT JOIN_NUM, CLUB_NUM, MEMBER_NUM, JOIN_MEMBERLEVEL, JOIN_MEMBERINFO, JOIN_DATE, JOIN_STATUS, JOIN_MEMBERNAME, JOIN_MEMBERPHONE, JOIN_MEMBEREMAIL, JOIN_MEMBERPHOTO FROM CLUBJOINLIST WHERE CLUB_NUM = #{clubNum} AND JOIN_STATUS = '대기'
